Text.Page:
Many researchers were sent to Stone Pillar Relics to study the area, but they have all been chased away by the Kulkari positioned there.

It is urgent that we secure the grounds there before the statue research can begin. If you could eliminate the {@LinkCreature:21#9#Crag Stalker ragers} and {@LinkCreature:21#10#Crag Stalker crushers} from the area, it would help us get started on the research sooner.
Thank you. We can finally concentrate on our research.
